block.p: * Gear.com, Seattle, a Web site that sells sporting goods, to GMO/Hill, Holliday, San Francisco, part of the Interpublic Group of Cos., to handle its account, which had been at DDB Seattle, part of the DDB Worldwide unit of the Omnicom Group. Billings were estimated at $10 million. * CompuBank, Houston, an online bank, to McCaffery Ratner Gottlieb & Lane, New York, to handle its first account. Billings were estimated at $5 million to $10 million. * Grant's Investor Inc., New York, to Frierson Mee & Kraft, New York, to handle its first account. Billings were estimated at over $3 million.
